alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Brevard, southeastern Orange and northeastern Osceola Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lone Cabbage Fish Camp, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Melbourne, Rockledge, Cocoa, Lone Cabbage Fish Camp and Sharpes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
